sentences.sentence: The pathologist found that the cause of death was status asthmaticus.
sentences.translation: 病理学家发现死因是哮喘。

sentences.sentence: The pathologist said he had been “tortured to death”.
sentences.translation: 病理学家称他已经被“折磨的差点死掉”。

sentences.sentence: By this time, hardly surprisingly, he was working as a pathologist.
sentences.translation: 到此，就几乎不令人惊讶了，他的工作是一名病理学家。
